1612500.name: Dominoes3D Simulator
1612500.description:
IMPORTANT INFORMATION: 3/10/2025 Scaling was updated (need to finish tutorials) but the first scene is ready to go again!

This game is a fun dominoes simulator! Do you remember how fun it was to knock them over?! No real dominoes required :P

You can place your dominoes on the board, watch them fall and do it over and over! There are save and load options for those who want to keep their creations and show them off or edit them later to add more!

Domino deletion real-time!

There are 8 save slots available that can also be overwritten if you want to improve a current design!

Feel free to report any errors and fixes needed. Don't forget to review!

Enjoy!

NOTE: Once I get some reviews/feedback, I will be able to further progress on the game :) Hoping all is well

MAJOR BENEFITS:

1. Requires much less computation than other simulators of similar genre!

2. Continuously updated!

3. Less expensive to have fun!

4. Let me know what else is great about this simulator compared to others!

Check out the game devlog on the menu page of the game!
1612500.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
